body.head: Tools
body.p: This page lists useful tools and resources.

list.item: Create custom subcollections using the Create a Subcollection tool, and share your subcollections in the form of simple URLs.
Consult the Bibliography of English Provincial Book Trade by John Feather (on this site), or the Dicey and Marshall Catalogue 1764 (at the Bodleian Libraries).
Report errors and suggest enhancements to the site; for full details, see How to Help.
Find out What's New on this Site.
